text: You shift towards the hearts extreme. Gain one popularity

text: Gain one popularity

name: Regress to the Mean
text: Shift towards the center and gain one popularity

name: Two Party System
text: Your followers shift towards your opponent, then their followers shift towards you. Gain one popularity

name: Personality over Policy
text: Shift towards your opponent and gain one political capital

name: Criticize Rival
text: Shift away from your opponent, then your opponent loses one popularity
